ProjectTitle: Establishing a multifunctional catalytic platform for sustainable and divergent C-C coupling reactions via combined C-H activation and C-S, C-O or C-C heterogroup activation
InitialFeedbackHistory: 02/12/2024 [REDACTED] Please note that box is a cloud storage outside of the university's secure environment; for more information see: https://icts.kuleuven.be/sc/english/storage/box [REDACTED] Please note that the KU [REDACTED] RDM policy asks for 10 years of data preservation: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/policy; data preservation on a hard drive gives a high risk of data loss; for solutions recommended by ICTS see: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en [REDACTED] [REDACTED] you mention no restrictions to data sharing, you can consider sharing your data in a trusted data repository such as KU [REDACTED] RDR, this way others can find and reuse your data which gives you more visibility and your data more impact. [REDACTED] more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
